Synonyms.Synonym: Holmium laser enucleation of the prostate

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Prostate resection - minimally invasive
QAPair.Answer: Minimally invasive prostate resection is surgery to remove part of the prostate gland, to treat an enlarged prostate . The surgery will improve the flow of urine through the urethra, the tube that carries urine from the bladder outside of your body. It can be done in different ways. There is no incision (cut) in your skin.
